Bachelor of Technology - Computer Information Systems, GPA 3.78, June 2024  
Dean’s List (8x), National Honor Society  

## PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

- Reduced job application time by 60% and increased applications by 300% using FastAPI and OpenAI GPT-4.1.
